getInbox.description: Retrieves recent emails from your Gmail inbox

parameters.limit: Maximum number of emails to retrieve

readEmail.description: Retrieves the full content and details of a specific email

parameters.emailId: The ID of the email to read

searchEmails.description: Search emails using Gmail query syntax (e.g., 'from:user@example.com', 'subject:meeting', 'is:unread')

parameters.searchQuery: Gmail search query (supports full Gmail search syntax)
parameters.limit: Maximum number of emails to return

sendEmail.description: Send a new email via Gmail with support for HTML content, CC, BCC, and multiple recipients

parameters.to: Recipient email address(es), comma-separated for multiple recipients
parameters.subject: Email subject line
parameters.body: Email body content (plain text or HTML)
parameters.isHtml: Whether the body is HTML formatted (default: false)

parameters.emailId: The ID of the email to reply to
parameters.isHtml: Whether the body is HTML formatted (default: false)

replyAllToEmail.description: Reply to all recipients of an email

parameters.emailId: The ID of the email to reply to
parameters.isHtml: Whether the body is HTML formatted (default: false)

forwardEmail.description: Forward an email to other recipients

parameters.emailId: The ID of the email to forward
parameters.to: Recipient email address(es), comma-separated for multiple recipients
parameters.body: Optional additional message to include with the forwarded email
parameters.isHtml: Whether the additional body is HTML formatted (default: false)

createDraft.description: Create a new email draft without sending it

parameters.to: Recipient email address(es), comma-separated for multiple recipients
parameters.subject: Email subject line
parameters.body: Email body content (plain text or HTML)
parameters.isHtml: Whether the body is HTML formatted (default: false)

parameters.draftId: The ID of the draft to update
parameters.to: Recipient email address(es), comma-separated for multiple recipients
parameters.subject: Email subject line
parameters.body: Email body content (plain text or HTML)
parameters.isHtml: Whether the body is HTML formatted (default: false)

parameters.draftId: The ID of the draft to send
The ID of the draft to delete

listDrafts.description: Retrieve a list of all email drafts

parameters.limit: Maximum number of drafts to retrieve

markAsRead.description: Mark one or more emails as read

parameters.emailIds: Array of email IDs to mark as read

markAsUnread.description: Mark one or more emails as unread

parameters.emailIds: Array of email IDs to mark as unread

archiveEmail.description: Archive one or more emails (removes from inbox but keeps in All Mail)

parameters.emailIds: Array of email IDs to archive

trashEmail.description: Move one or more emails to trash

parameters.emailIds: Array of email IDs to move to trash

deleteEmail.description: Permanently delete one or more emails (cannot be undone)

parameters.emailIds: Array of email IDs to delete permanently

starEmail.description: Add or remove star from one or more emails

parameters.emailIds: Array of email IDs to star/unstar
parameters.star: true to add star, false to remove star

moveToFolder.description: Move one or more emails to a specific Gmail label (folder)

parameters.emailIds: Array of email IDs to move
parameters.labelId: The ID of the label to move emails to

listLabels.description: Retrieve all Gmail labels (folders) in the account

parameters.labelId: The ID of the label to delete

applyLabel.description: Apply a label to one or more emails

parameters.emailIds: Array of email IDs to apply label to
parameters.labelId: The ID of the label to apply

removeLabel.description: Remove a label from one or more emails

parameters.emailIds: Array of email IDs to remove label from
parameters.labelId: The ID of the label to remove

updateLabel.description: Update properties of an existing Gmail label

parameters.labelId: The ID of the label to update
parameters.name: New name for the label (optional)

getEmailThread.description: Retrieve all emails in a conversation thread

parameters.threadId: The ID of the email thread to retrieve

downloadAttachment.description: Download an attachment from an email

parameters.emailId: The ID of the email containing the attachment
parameters.attachmentId: The ID of the attachment to download

batchModifyEmails.description: Apply multiple modifications to multiple emails at once (add/remove labels, mark read/unread, etc.)

parameters.emailIds: Array of email IDs to modify
parameters.addLabelIds: Array of label IDs to add (optional)
parameters.removeLabelIds: Array of label IDs to remove (optional)

batchDeleteEmails.description: Permanently delete multiple emails at once

parameters.emailIds: Array of email IDs to delete permanently
